scripts.cypress:firstTests: npm run allure:clear && cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/Mon_projet/javascriptFeatures/firstTests.spec.js' && npm run allure:open
scripts.allure:open: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.allure:clear: if [ -f "allure-results" ]; then rmdir /q /s allure-results; fi && if [ -f "allure-report" ]; then rmdir /q /s allure-report; fi && if [ -f "cypress/screenshots" ]; then rmdir /q /s cypress/screenshots; fi && if [ -f "cypress/videos" ]; then rmdir /q /s cypress/videos; fi
scripts.Test:run: npm run allure:clear; npm run feature:login; npm run feature:logout; npm run allure:open
